name: Spirits of Dawn
description:
Spirits of Dawn is a game made with RPG Maker MV. You play as the son/daughter of a noble warrior. Your father mysteriously disappears and you suspect that he may be in danger. It is your quest to find where he has gone.

This game features many forms of puzzles, dialogue challenges, and many others to make every aspect of the game interesting.

As of now, Spirits of Dawn is in very early access. Once we get a large amount of the game complete, we will have a limited early access release. User feedback is extremely important to us, so we are mainly doing this in order to understand what direction to take this game in.

Expected release date: 12/31/18

Follow us on Twitter for updates.
